review: If you are only streaming content from the internet then the Fire TV works great.  If that's all you want it for, though, there are cheaper options that will work just as well.If you have any local content then the Fire TV a bad choice.  Why?  If the internet goes out it bricks the Fire TV.  I found this out the hard way recently when a storm knocked out our internet service for a few days.  The Fire TV refused to load any Apps or Games (with a "Sorry, X is Unavailable" message) until the internet came back.  I could not use Plex to stream content locally from my server, I could not play any games, I could not use an AirPlay app to display content from other devices.  The Fire TV was completely and totally useless for anything.Maybe there was some buried menu setting, some trick, or some hack to fool the Fire TV into letting me use local content without the internet.  I neither know nor care - I want my entertainment devices to "just work", and the Fire TV simply doesn't.
author: KT
